description: Smokey and BBQ flavours are engulfed within these savoury rice and tofu zongzi.
name: Tofu Zongzi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small white onion, peeled and diced
24 seasonal leafy greens, soaked in water

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the glutinous rice in water for 60 minutes. Also soak the leaves in water until they soften.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Fry the tofu for 5 minutes while turning.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Add the spices, seasoning, soy and vinegar to the pan and fry for 2 more minutes.
Drain the liquid from the rice.
Taking 3 leaves per zongzi, create a cup shape with the leaves and place some rice, then spoon some of the tofu mixture and then cover with more rice.
Carefully fold the leaves around the zongzi as tight as possible and secure closed with some suitable tie.
Bring a large pot of water to the boil, then simmer, place all the covered zongzi into the water and allow to cook for 150 minutes.
Carefully remove the zongzi from the water and remove the leaves to enjoy with a choice of condiments.
